article.headline: Alabama State 58, Miss. Valley St. 48
article.story: ITTA BENA, Miss. (AP) -- Andrew Hayles had 17 points to lead Alabama State to a 58-48 victory over Mississippi Valley State on Saturday night. Akeim Claborn added 15 points and 11 rebounds for the Hornets (7-14, 5-5 Southwestern Athletic Conference), who have won three straight and five of six. Richard Lott added 10 points for Alabama State, which shot 43 percent and led by as many as 13. Jesse Taylor had 13 points and 10 rebounds, and Carl Lucas added 10 points for the Delta Devils (6-13, 6-4), who have followed a four-game winning streak with three straight losses. Alabama State broke the game open in the second half, thanks to Hayles, who hit consecutive 3-pointers shortly after halftime to give the Hornets the lead for good.
